channel.title: Need help? Post your problem here!
channel.description:
[i]Because of my latest update, I have 1 week free time to answer Java, Html, CSS, PhP, or MySQL questions. Although I've started this topic, feel free to answer anyones question. Please make sure you quote their topic though, because this allows them to specify what you're referring to. [/i] [b]Please post in this section with the following format if you have a question:[/b] [i]Press "Reply", then post with the code below...[/i]
[code] Problem: (Specific please) Language: (Java, Html, CSS, PhP, or MySQL) Email: (Optional) [/code]
[b]Please post in this section with the following format if you have a question:[/b] Press "Quote", and then reply with the code below...
[code] Solution: (Specific as possible) Email: (Optional) [/code]
[i] If you have any problems, this is your place. This is an open topic for anyone to answer any question![/i]
[b] A note: This topic isn't against the rules. This is a topic to help others in need of fast and easy-moderate-high level help. I've read the TOS many times to make sure that this isn't against the rules. Please remember that I am all for Mopar rules, and I will, and hope everyone who posts here, will report abusers.[/b]
Thanks! Lagex

item.title: Need help? Post your problem here!
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“jeffrey142, post:7, topic:201286”]where can i change the expoints you get from yew logs?[/quote]Wow you still don’t get it, read his topic and layout.

Read full topic

@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“kevin727, post:5, topic:201286”]need help with my gs minigame how do i make my own global ofject or how can iknow the globalobject id??[/quote][quote=“xelvinasx, post:4, topic:201286”]how to make portal that tele you to my minigame :)[/quote][quote=“Frenchpkarea, post:3, topic:201286”]Problem: (My model ID are differents on my client and my server, so when i’m spawning a armadyl helm , it says armadyl helm but looks like a clue scroll , so i know i have to change model ID but i don’t know where they are , can you help me??)
Language: (Java)
Email: (N/A)[/quote][quote=“JRealm, post:2, topic:201286”]Problem: Testing your Java Knowledge, What is an Constructor?
Language: Java
Email: N/a[/quote]He means through e-mail

Read full topic

item.title: Need help? Post your problem here!
item.dc:creator: @Lagex Lagex
item.description:
@Lagex wrote:

Because of my latest update, I have 1 week free time to answer Java, Html, CSS, PhP, or MySQL questions.
Although I’ve started this topic, feel free to answer anyones question. Please make sure you quote their topic though, because this allows them to specify what you’re referring to.

Please post in this section with the following format if you have a question:
Press “Reply”, then post with the code below…

Problem: (Specific please)
Language: (Java, Html, CSS, PhP, or MySQL)
Email: (Optional)

Please post in this section with the following format if you have a question:
Press “Quote”, and then reply with the code below…

Solution: (Specific as possible)
Email: (Optional)


If you have any problems, this is your place. This is an open topic for anyone to answer any question!


A note:
This topic isn’t against the rules. This is a topic to help others in need of fast and easy-moderate-high level help.
I’ve read the TOS many times to make sure that this isn’t against the rules. Please remember that I am all for
Mopar rules, and I will, and hope everyone who posts here, will report abusers.

Thanks!
Lagex

Read full topic
item.source: Need help? Post your problem here!
